<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legendary Survivalist](/Feats.aspx?ID=5174) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

You can survive indefinitely without food or water and can endure severe, extreme, and incredible cold and heat without taking damage from doing so.
name: Legendary Survivalist

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 15" pfs="Standard" > Legendary Survivalist Source Player Core pg. 258 2.0 Prerequisites Legendary in Survival --- You can survive indefinitely without food or water and can endure severe, extreme, and incredible cold and heat without taking damage from doing so.
